ygData.subject: RE: Bard Equipment Question
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I know a wizard, well, let s just say took advantage of the door room near the graveyard.  He told me that during his time there he would estimate the drop
ygData.messageBody:
> Wow! I guess I didn't know how lucky I was when I got mine then! I was
> camping the secret room off of the Mistmoore Graveyard for my Black Silk
> Gloves and experience when the Caitliff just sauntered in and we killed him.
> He had the helm and I won the roll and have been wearing it ever since: AC
> 10, STR 6, CHA 3, Weight 5.0. Good bardic stuff.

I know a wizard, well, let's just say took advantage of the door
room near the graveyard. He told me that during his time there
he would estimate the drop (when the Caitliff spawned) is like
1 in 10. This guy sold spaulders like there's no tomorrow, but
was fairly stingy enough on the helms. I have been there and
seen the Caitliff slain without helm on a few occasions. But,
I seem to get the bad effects of the random number generator.

Harmonic.
